author.name: Repubblica
en_text: "A little boy once asked my father: 'What happens if I fall into a black hole?' And he replied: 'You will be turned into spaghetti.' I realized it was a way to get kids interested in science. " Lucy Hawking at # onlife19. Here the live: https://t.co/aSdSeQWsNn https://t.co/1VKFkDk6tz
